DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to use structural and functional magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) to study children at high risk for schizophrenia. It is hypothesized that children at high risk for schizophrenia will have abnormalities of brain development, especially of the cerebral cortex. The study will also describe normal brain development in children from birth to age 6 years
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Studies of the Pathogenesis of Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: control, offspring of mother with schizophrenia or bipolar illness; child with MVM major neurological or medical illness
